thread.title: Bernie Sanders Calls President Trump A “Fraud” On CNN
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders Calls President Trump A “Fraud” On CNN

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Bernie Sanders Calls President Trump A “Fraud” On CNN
text:
Bernie Sanders Calls President Trump A “Fraud” On CNN 0 shares 05:47pm February 5, 2017 Do you like this article? 
Bernie Sanders has been playing nice (kinda) about the whole Trump thing recently and he gave us a couple of different signs that he might be one of the few liberals out there who can act civil even though the election didn’t go their way. 
That all changed on CNN today. 
Check out this little outburst from Bernie. 
Gee, that’s a pretty bold move from Bernie considering he’s a complete fraud in his own right. 
His political career is the literal definition of the word fraud. 
Bernie ran around for a year railing against Wall Street greed then he turned around and endorsed the biggest Wall Street insider on the planet for president. That tells you everything you need to know about Bernie. Bernie has no credibility on the subject of Wall Street. Sorry. 
Not only that, but the guy’s #1 gripe is income inequality and yet he has three houses despite never holding down a solid job in the private sector . 
Bernie doesn’t have to like Trump but he has absolutely no leg to stand on when he calls him a fraud. 
Bernie might be the most disingenuous politician we have ever seen which makes it pretty hilarious that his supporters have created this image of him as a stand-up guy who shoots straight. 
He’s a total joke and the fact his supporters don’t see that speaks volumes. 
All the information is out there. All they have to do is Google it. But, they choose not to. 
Sad.
